alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Union (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 2:58PM MDT until June 17 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Union County in northeastern New Mexico... East central Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 257 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles east of Branson to 10 miles north of Farley, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Des Moines, Folsom, Grenville, Clayton Lake State Park, Seneca, Capulin, Mount Dora and Moses. This includes Highway 64 between Mile Markers 377 and 424. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
